title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption in their friendship.

title: The Godfather
description: The story of the Corleone family under patriarch Vito Corleone, focusing on the transformation of his youngest son, Michael, from reluctant family outsider to ruthless mafia boss.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the mentally challenged criminal mastermind Joker emerges from Gotham's underworld, he forces Batman to confront everything he believes in and fight for the soul of Gotham.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze away from Minas Tirith, as Frodo and Sam journey deep into Mordor to destroy the One Ring.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, and a gangster's wife intertwine in a series of violent events across Los Angeles.

title: Schindler's List
description: The true story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of over a thousand Jews during the Holocaust.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl, Chihiro Ogino, finds herself in a strange and fantastical world of spirits. She must journey through this world to find her missing parents and escape to the human world.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a young janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a therapist to find direction in his life.
